name: generate-release-notes-task
description: Genereate Release Notes from the last sucessfuly release.
author: Michael Barry

inputs.name: ToAddress
inputs.label: To Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address the email should be sent to.

inputs.name: FromAddress
inputs.label: From Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address the email should be sent from. If you control the build controller you can set environment variable: RELEASE_TASK_FROM_ADDRESS. This setting will override.

inputs.name: SmtpServer
inputs.label: Smtp Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SMTP server you wish to use. If you control the build controller you can set environment variable: RELEASE_TASK_SMTP_SERVER. This setting will override.

inputs.name: CssFile
inputs.label: Css File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to proved a custom css, specify it here. For Reference see here: https://github.com/jabbera/release-notes-task/blob/master/Tasks/GenerateReleaseNotes/defaultStyle.css
